entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add examples to xmldoc for AddOpenAPI extension methods/overloads #58807
  • .NET 9 - OpenAPI Not Generating Output #58805
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, mvc, plaintext #58804
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #58803
  • Quarantine Interop.FunctionalTests.Http3.Http3RequestTests.POST_ClientCancellationUpload_RequestAbortRaised(protocol: Http3) #58802
  • ApiVersionMatchPolicy invalidates catch-all endpoint incorrectly #58795
  • QuickGrid throws InvokeAsync exception when RefreshDataAsync() is called #58794
  • Improve performance of ClaimsIdentity #58793
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • Modify the Blazor Web App template #53381
    9.0-preview2
  • blazor wasm project deployed with error when config `PublishTrimmed true` and `TrimMode link` #51513
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor static SSR ExpressionFormatter.FormatLambda adds zero symbols \0\0\0\0 into an input name attribute value when it's size exceeds 128 symbols due to a bug in a ReverseStringBuilder #58689
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #58784
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md for project #27562
  • Perf regression: caching, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #58792
  • Improve experience for new contributors to repo #27380
  • [Blazor WASM] Razor helper methods will not render content when used as inner HTML of components #58717
  • Too many of the same ACCELERATE KEYS (Alt+I) when creating a new project Blazor web app #58750
    10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine Http2RequestTests.GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #52238
    Test failures
  • Quarantine Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #57944
  • Quarantine Http1Connection_ServerAbort_HasErrorType #58086

PullRequests

Created

  • Add examples to AddOpenApi extension method/overloads #58808
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update branding to 9.0.1 #58801
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.1

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update Messagepack dependency #58676
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.36
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58510
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.36
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.12
  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.12
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58741
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.12
  • Update branding to 8.0.12 #58800
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.12
  • Update milestones for Dec/Jan #58806
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix `ExpressionFormatter` sometimes generating malformed expression strings #58799
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Fixed the hot-keys for Blazor WebApp template options #58790
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Update Selenium packages #58791
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Remove GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #58738
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #58789
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine Http1Connection_ServerAbort_HasErrorType #58788
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Quarantine CanUseAntiforgeryAfterInitialRender #57767
    area-blazor
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58734
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Use MacOS-13 in CI #58549
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • no dispatchGlobalEventToAllElements when no renderer attached #58667
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
